lab.name: Visual Intelligence Lab @ Drexel
lab.description: We are a research group at Drexel University led by Prof. Feng Liu, focused on advancing computer vision, machine learning, and artificial intelligence to solve fundamental and applied problems in 3D vision, generative AI, and AI for societal impact.

about.mission: The Visual Intelligence Lab at Drexel University is dedicated to pioneering research in computer vision, machine learning, and artificial intelligence. Our mission is to develop innovative technologies that advance the state-of-the-art in visual understanding and create meaningful societal impact.

research_areas.title: 3D Vision & Reconstruction
research_areas.description: We develop cutting-edge methods for 3D object and scene understanding, enabling next-generation applications in virtual reality, augmented reality, and autonomous systems.

research_areas.title: Generative AI & Deep Learning
research_areas.description: Our research focuses on building controllable and explainable generative models with applications spanning healthcare diagnostics, educational technology, and creative AI systems.

research_areas.title: AI for Social Good
research_areas.description: We leverage artificial intelligence to address critical challenges in healthcare, education, accessibility, and other human-centered applications that benefit society.

values: Mentorship and development of next-generation researchers
Ethical AI development with societal impact in mind

highlights.title: 3D Vision & Intelligence
highlights.description: Exploring next-generation methods for 3D object/scene understanding and immersive VR/AR applications.

highlights.title: Generative AI
highlights.description: Building controllable and explainable generative models with applications in healthcare, education, and beyond.

highlights.title: Societal Impact
highlights.description: Leveraging AI for healthcare, education, and human-centered applications.

news.title: Our paper "Person Recognition in Aerial Surveillance: A Decade Survey" is accepted by IEEE T-BIOM.
Dr. Liu was recognized as one of the ICCV 2025 Outstanding Reviewers.
Dr. Liu is serving as an Area Chair for CVPR 2026, ICLR 2026.
Our paper "HAMoBE" is accepted by ICCV 2025.
Dr. Liu is serving as an Area Chair for BMVC 2025, ACM MM 2025, FG 2025, IJCNN 2025.
Two papers, "SapiensID" and "AG-VPReID," have been accepted by CVPR 2025.

faculty.name: Feng Liu
faculty.description: Department of Computer Science, Drexel University
